body: Data standards, tools and curricula materials have been developed into DHIS2 modules to strengthen and monitor national routine surveillance systems and to support use of data for decision-making in all transmission settings.
title: DHIS2-based surveillance support tools
recommendation:
All cases of suspected malaria should have a parasitological test (microscopy or Rapid diagnostic test (RDT)) to confirm the diagnosis.
Both microscopy and RDTs should be supported by a quality assurance programme.
Good practice statement
